name: data-card-19
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first place overall in the Pokéathlon over wirelss.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first place overall in the Pokéathlon over wirelss.

flavor_text.sun-moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon wins you have had.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon wins you have had.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon wins you have had.
